# Discover Luano City

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/9c92bfc9-54d5-4785-b80c-8e774b381de3/Luano+City+-+Logo+with+lines.png)

### **Live . Work . Shop . Fly**

[MORE VIDEOS](https://www.luanocity.com/videos)

![Dynamic arrow cursor for Luano City website.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/556bb094-0037-4ead-a794-710d139497b9/down-arrow-icon-vector-image-600+white.png)

## Your Gateway to Prosperity

![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/c9737737-ad98-4bc6-a7ad-94236b09c4d0/Luano+City_Slogan+EN.png)

[![Multiple modern houses at Flamboyant Estate in Luano City with red tiled roofs, beige walls, and well-maintained gardens and hedges along brick pathways in a suburban neighborhood under a partly cloudy sky.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/587bd019-6a78-47c6-81ff-90388e5f97a7/Luano+City+Developements.jpg)](https://www.luanocity.com/developments)

## [Our developments](https://www.luanocity.com/developments)

![Modern single-story house with beige exterior walls, brown tiled roof, black framed windows, and small front porch with wooden and concrete fencing, surrounded by green bushes and trees under cloudy sky at Flamboyant Estate in Luano City.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/1747212334870-PV7KGEP7XWI0UH5MDS55/Luano+City-Flamboyant+Estate-Stuidios+Apartments_7497.jpg)

## [Gallery](https://www.luanocity.com/gallery)

![Sunset over a grassy field with dew drops on the grass blades at Luano City.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/1738348062077-HPJLYEUEBLXBFSKUBTFM/grass-546794_1280.jpg)

## [FAQ’s](https://www.luanocity.com/faqs)

![Interior view of a stairway with metal handrails and green potted plants, large windows showing a sidewalk outdoors at the complete commercial offices at Luano City.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/553be256-4a16-4f4c-8d95-493a5788f5b7/Luano+City-Offices_1247.JPG)

![Satellite view of Luano City with roads, buildings, greenery, and an airport runway labeled Luano International Airport.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/b37e743e-62d9-4a9a-a4c0-0c4ee1dba928/Luano+City+Live+Aerial+Satellite+Map.png)

## [About](https://www.luanocity.com/about)

## [For Sale/\ \ To Let](https://www.luanocity.com/for-sale-/-to-let)

![Assorted appetizers and finger foods on wooden and glass platters, including mini sandwiches, skewered meats, and small bowls with dips, set on a black table at a casual gathering at the Luano City Frangipani Cocktail party.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/578f25a2-6056-47e4-b536-27a4030dc11d/Photographs+from+the+Luano+City+Frangipani+Estate+Opening+Cocktail+event%2C+Lubumbashi%2C+Democratic+Republic+of+Congo+20241050.jpg)

![Close-up of a red and yellow hibiscus flower stamen with yellow pollen and red filaments, blurred green background at Luano City.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67952ac142a3875e7c92ff62/d74d9881-a104-47f3-82b3-05733b0e2a67/red-stamen-hibiscus-flower.jpg)

metadata.description:
At Luano City, we specialize in helping you buy, sell, or invest in real estate on our 220 hectare site located next to the Lubumbashi International Airport. Due to its strategic location and connectivity between the Capital and mining hubs, Luano City's development offers residents an unparalleled , At Luano City, we specialize in helping you buy, sell, or invest in real 
estate on our 220 hectare site located next to the Lubumbashi International 
Airport. Due to its strategic location and connectivity between the Capital 
and mining hubs, Luano City's development offers residents an unparalleled 
lifestyle experience and investment growth. Live, Work, Play & Fly with us 
at Luano City.
